column2: Focus on moderate-to-high cardio and isotonic exercises with balanced core and flexibility training.
Highly cardio-intensive workouts with high total calories burned and minimal strength or mobility training.
Moderate and balanced workouts combining cardio, strength, and functional training without a specific focus.
Primarily strength-focused workouts with high functional training and free weights, but low cardio.
Flexibility and mobility-centric workouts with minimal cardio or strength components.
High-intensity and diverse workouts combining cardio, strength, free weights, and functional training.
